section.title: <embed>
section.para: This element embeds Bonobo controls. That way it is possible to put GNOME panel applets into a desklet.

note.para: This element is in an experimental state and Bonobo is becoming a deprecated technology on the GNOME Desktop and Developer Platform.

row.entry: OAFIID of the Bonobo control that you want to embed. Consult the Bonobo documentation for details.

section.title: Examples
section.para: Since this element is deprecated we don't provide an exmple.
